body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Eugene Barnes and the customer's name is Madison Smith.  The conversation is about Strolid Motors (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Services. My name is John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I'm having some issues with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emily. To proceed, could you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, it's one zero zero zero two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Could you also provide your email address associated with the account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emily. I have all the information I need and will start looking into the issue right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, John. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Emily. Thank you for your time. Have a great day! Goodbye.
